verbs.description: [V: sleeping] around [ARGM-TMP: before marriage] does n’t reduce marital happiness … all that much a new report shows that people who have the fewest sexual partners one in their lifetime claim to have the happiest marriages the more sexual partner a person has the less likely they are to report having a very happy marriage institute of family studies cult of the dead cow cdc the atlantic marriage partner national survey of family growth happiness
